sentences.sContent: notorious cases of human rights abuses
sentences.sCn: 臭名昭著的践踏人权案

sentences.sContent: ...he became notorious because of the coca drink he developed...
...He is a notorious guy in many girls’eyes...
...Providers offering broadband for rock bottom prices are notorious for poor service...

exam.question: That part of the city has long been ______ for its street violence.

answer.explain: 句意： 长期以来， 该城市的那个地区因街头暴力而臭名远扬。responsible： 有责任的； historical： 历史的； illegal： 违法的。

synos.tran: 声名狼藉的，臭名昭著的

remMethod.val: not(标志) ＋ orious(多…的) → 臭名昭著的

words.tran: 众所周知地；声名狼藉地；恶名昭彰地

trans.tranOther: famous or well-known for something bad
